name: Give The People What They Want
summary: In Give the People What They Want, you play as a lowly mining robot who has been promoted to the service industry. It's a tough job, customers can be very demanding, and you'll need to adapt to whatever people need based on the jobs you're given. You will need to learn how to optimize to get people what they want in the shortest amount of time and deal with their increasingly complex requests to show that you can be a good quality service bot.
